title: My handwriting sucks
body: Honestly an autistic monkey having a seizure could write better then me, for as long as I can remember my handwriting has been the exact same it has only gotten smaller over time not neater. It seems my writing will never improve so how am I supposed to go through life with such messy writing and how can I have a signature with such messy writing?

replies.body:
I spend an hour writing an essay and i only do it to get complimented on the handwriting.

Oh, did i mention i only did 1 page?
Type up what u want to write on computer(big font)... print it out... Trace it....copy it...there u got it
Signature's don't have to be clean, they are just a signature, it doesn't even have to be your name (most people just do their name as their signature.)
